name: Flick Tactics
description:
A turn-Based strategy game that you can play with some other person on the same screen. Inspired by Advance Wars and Into The Breach.

The game requires some time before all the images, fonts and sounds are loaded. In other words, it won't stop you from playing before all the content is loaded (which is something to fix).

The game is made in collaboration with the HomeTeam GameDev community.
